title: 348: CHATTY BROS: Worst Birthday Ever + Clayton’s Villain
itunes:title: 348: CHATTY BROS: Worst Birthday Ever + Clayton’s Villain
description:
The Bros are here and Evan is celebrating his birthday - and in true celebration they are sharing the #broadsquads worst birthdays! Then they dive into episode two of Clayton’s Bachelor season - chatting Cassidy being a VILLAIN villain, Shanae making ALL the mistakes, Teddi being the front runner and more! And then, of course, they chat some celebrity crushes and The Broads conversation, fantasies, Grayston talks D&D, and Evan opens a Plug Somethin’ package! 

 

PLUG  SOMETHIN’: 

Sun Freckled Studio: https://sunfreckledstudio.com/ - use code BROADS for 10% off sunfreckledstudios.comv

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sunfreckledstudio/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***CARE/OF: Get 50% off your first Care/of order at TAKECAREOF.COM and enter code CHATTY50

***FACTOR: Head to GO.FACTOR75.COM/PLANS and use code CHATTY120 to get $120 off your first 5 weeks of meals! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
